item.title: Moving an idea into business
Flashlight paper draft
item.description:
We submitted our Flashlight paper today. Find a draft at the address below: Schulte-Mecklenbeck, Michael , Murphy, Ryan O. and Hutzler, Florian,Flashlight – an Online Eye-Tracking Tool(July 13, 2009). Available at SSRN: http://ssrn.com/abstract=1433225
The software will be uploaded to the project page http://vlab.ethz.ch/vLab_Decision_Theory_and_Behavioral_Game_Theory/Flashlight.html. Have fun playing with it!
